c2effect.name: Flower Petals
c2effect.description: Effect that looks like a blooming flower
c2effect.author: GamesWarp Studio

param.name: X-Coord
param.description: X coord of mouse point. Remember to use "Mouse.X" if dependent on mouse location

param.name: Y-Coord
param.description: Y coord of mouse point. Remember to use "LayoutHeight - Mouse.Y" if dependent on mouse location

param.name: Petals
param.description: Governs number of petals. Use values ranging from -30 to 30 for best effect; sign denotes direction of rotation.

param.name: Zoom
param.description: Governs the zoom factor. Use values ranging from -100 to 100 for best effect; sign denotes direction of tunnel effect

param.name: Contrast
param.description: Controls the color contrast. Use values ranging from -1 to 10 for best effect
